name: Dusk Mane Necrozma
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: This is its form with it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on its foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.

attacks.name: Dusk Shot
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX. This damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Rusty Claws
attacks.effect: If your opponent has exactly 1 Prize card remaining, this attack does 100 more damage.
